title: How will advances in technology affect politics in the future? - Quora

response.answer_text: Politicians are proxies for the public interest in the political sphere. They have to regulate tech of each kind if it appears to be adverse to the goals. They have to use tech for their own procedures. They are funded from the proceeds of its profits. They set priorities for research and development. They have to safeguard against being manipulated by rivals. Their own functioning is automating. Technocracy should not become tyranny. Constituent consensus can be collected closer to groups and individuals. Problems are similar so there may be additional protocols dedicated to this globally.

The wastage of paper in elections has become an old excuse to bring technology in the polling process. All parties are now using it for propaganda and the election commission has introduced EVM system and VVPat machines. Further advancement in technology would bring more economy in polling process.
